snippet: The Los Angeles Clippers owner’s conversation with Anderson Cooper left the N.B.A. commissioner apologizing for Donald Sterling’s continued verbal attack on the former Los Angeles Lakers star.
abstract: NBA commissioner Adam Silver slaps Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling with a public rebuke, while apologizing to Magic Johnson, in wake of another round of insensitive comments by Sterling in an interview with Anderson Cooper that was broadcast on CNN.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers owner’s conversation with Anderson Cooper left the N.B.A. commissioner apologizing for Donald Sterling’s continued verbal attack on the former Los Angeles Lakers star.

headline.main: Silver Issues a Response After Sterling’s Interview
